inn1.comm: on target, around that off stump and Salman leans forward to defend to the off side

Dead plumb! RP nails India's tormentor Salman Butt. It landed on a length, just outside off stump and came in with the angle. Salman was caught at the crease as he pushed tentatively forward and was trapped in front.
beaten. Around that off stump, leaving Younis Khan who pushes at it with an open-face of the bat.
much better footwork this time. He leaned across, got close to the line of a delivery slanting away from him and pushed it to cover region
fuller, straighter, on the middle, trying to trap him lbw but Younis quickly arrests his front-foot movement, brings the bat in front and drives to mid-on

another pleasing drive, this time to mid-off but straight to the fielder. Younis looked in great touch in the last game before he shouldered arms to a delivery from around the stumps. It was RP to Younis, could have been Sandhu to Greenidge!
floated outside off stump, Malik lets that one go past him. Tendulkar is in the first slip and has a chat with Dhoni.
on a length, straighter, on the middle and off, punched back to the bowler
on the middle and leg, curving in from the middle, worked to left of midwicket for a single
in the zone outside off stump, not much swing but Younis is careful, covers his off stump before he lets that one go through to Dhoni
he leans forward this time to a fuller delivery outside off stump and drives to mid-off
on a length, on the stumps, pushed to the off side
lands it on a length, just outside off stump, comes in with the angle, Younis is not shouldering arms this time, gets behind the line and pushes it to the off side
from wide of the crease, fuller, just outside off stump, Younis leans across and wrists it to midwicket
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to cover
length delivery outside off stump, dabbed to wide third man for a single
curving in towards the pad, Malik is careful and works it to just right of midwicket. In better days, he would have used his wrists more and whipped it through square leg
keeps a tad low, just outside off stump, Younis jabs it away through backward point
slightly short of length, on the off stump line, Younis short-arm pulls it through midwicket for three runs
beaten Full in length, around the middle and off stump line, and it moves away, past the outside edge
drifts on to the legs and Malik is quick to jump on to that and whips it through midwicket. Easy pickings.
length delivery on the off and middle, Malik leans forward, uses his wrists and turns it to long leg

Dropped by Dhoni. It was a length delivery around the off stump, Younis doesn't quite lean forward, just stabs at it as the ball curves in a touch. It took the inside edge and flew low and to the left of Dhoni who dived but couldn't hold on.
fuller, outside off stump, driven to the off side
on a length, coming in from just outside off stump, pushed to cover
fullish, on the off and middle stump line, Malik pushes at it and is squared-up and gets a outside edge to backward point
on the middle and leg, from a length, wristed past square leg
just outside off stump, going on with the usual angle, punched to cover
tip and run. Outside off stump, he drops it close on the off side and they rush across for a quick single
deck short of length, on the off and middle stump line, Malik gets on top of the bounce and defends
fuller this time, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
on the middle and leg, Pathan is getting it to just shape back in and Malik works it to midwicket
134.9 kmph, another length delivery and Malik punches it on the up, straight back down the track
138.9kmph, fuller, on the middle and off stump, full and straight, pushed to the off side

almost a mix-up. Younis pushed a full delivery towards cover and set off before sending Malik back. Gambhir rushed in, swooped and swiveled around to havea a shy at the non-striker's end but Malik was home. Not that it was a direct hit
138.4 kmph. Shout for lbw. It landed on a length, from round the stumps, just outside off stump and Younis pushed forward to defend. The ball hit him on the pad, a tad outside off stump.
leans forward to drive a full length delivery to cover
half-volley well outside off stump , Younis jumped at the line and the length and played a lovely square drive through cover point.
length delivery outside off stump and Younis dabs it to wide third man and by the time Zaheer gets around they pick up two runs

deja-vu. Again bit of width outside off stump and Younis leans forward, opens the bat-face and guides it to wide third man. Don't ask me why I bothered with the description after writing deja-vu. Aadat sey majboor. (a matter of habit)
full in length, outside off stump, Malik leans forward to drive to cover
a touch short in length, on the off and middle, Malik waits on the ball before wristing it to left of RP Singh at long leg
on a length, around that off stump and Malik pushes it cautiously down the track
again going away from Malik who plays it to backward point
on a length, on the middle stump line, goes on straight and Malik nudges it to the leg side
drags back the length, short in length, on the middle stump line, Malik punches it to midwicket

huge shout for lbw. Younis walks forward and across the sticks, RP hurls a dipping full toss which evades the intended flick and raps him low on the front pad, just outside off stump. The point of impact was outside off and he was playing a shot
drives well to left of cover where Robin Uthappa makes a fine diving stop before turning around to have a shy at the non-striker's end
length delivery, on the off stump, pushed to off side
RP is bowling over the wickets to Malik. This one darts away from Malik who stabs at it and is beaten
and again. Malik is trying to run it down to third man
Three in a row. This one was further outside off stump and Malik fishes at it but no wood on leather
fullish, around off stump, pushed to the off side.
on the middle stump line, from a length, worked to midwicket.
slower one, 120.3 kmph, on the off and middle, Younis waits on the front foot and guides it to point
slightly short in length, on the middle and leg, Younis drops it close on the leg side and will get a single for the effort
on a length, going away from Malik who taps it to backward point
fuller, lands on the middle, moves towards middle and off, defended on the front foot
full in length, on the off stump line - the nagging line continues- driven to cover
from round the stumps, just outside off stump, square driven to point. Younis is getting on to that front foot regularly now
closer to the off stump and dabbed to point
steered through vacant slip region. It was full and just outside off stump, Younis opened the bat-face and guided it. He didn't intend to hit it so fine but he got a edge which took the ball finer
yorker on the middle stump, Malik works it to midwicket
on a length, on the stumps and on driven to mid-on
again around that off stump, going away, guided to point
walks down the track and across, gets close to the line of the delivery going away from him and drives straight past the bowler for a single.
Now Malik walks down the track - just a step or two- and whips a length delivery from the off stump past square leg
on a length, around the off stump, punched to the leg side

the walk continues. Again he walks down the track, Zaheer pings the good length and keeps it on the off stump and Malik pushes it to cover. Its a slow track and the bowlers are hitting the off stump line; the batsmen are trying to put them off the length and also get close to the line by walking a step or two across
slower one, off cutter, outside off stump, Younis waited on the ball before tapping it to third man
fullish, around the off stump, square driven to cover point
Chased a wide delivery and some how managed to get it past point. He took a step down the track, lunged to his right and managed to square drive it past point
again that walk across, towards the off stump, gets close to the line of a delivery going away from him and pushes it to the off side
beaten Just short of driveable length, in the zone outside off stump and Malik tries to drive it on the up
full and outside off stump, Malik square drives it hard but straight to point
short of a length outside off, glanced away to third man for a single
short again, cramps him for room, near the rib-cage area, worked away to the leg side for a single
full and smacked gloriously down the ground for a four, straight bat, markers name showing fully and creamed past the bowler for four. Breaks the shackles there
around the wicket now, straighter and fullish in length, patted back down the ground
worked away to the leg side, not offered much room on that occassion, around the wicket angle seems to be working for Zaheer
good use of the wrists to turn it to the leg side, good fielding at short midwicket
leans forward to defend it down the track
stretches across to drive to cover but straight to the fielder

appeal for a catch by Dhoni but the umpire is not sure whether it carried. He (Ameish Saheba) walks to the squar-leg umpire (Billy Doctrove) and the decision stands. It was a slower one, full and outside off stump, Younis goes for a square drive and probably got a edge. Dhoni dives low to his front to 'take' it. He must have got a edge, otherwise he wouldn't have gone across to consult the other umpire. It must have bounced just in front of Dhoni. The replays seem to agree with the umpires.
just outside off stump, Younis is beaten as he tries to run it down to third man
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
Full and wide, crashed through extra cover. Malik stretched well forward and across to cream it through extra cover
closer to the off stump and driven to cover this time
on a length, angling away from Malik who partly-edges and partly-steers it to third man

again that walk down the track and across, gets close to the delivery around the off stump and drives crisply straight down the track. RP Singh gets to his right from mid-off and dives to make a fine stop
slanting away from Malik who runs it down to third man for a single
banged in short, the wicket is slow and so, the ball stops on Younis who mistimes his pull shot to Gambhir at midwicket
slower one, full and outside off stump, Malik waits before he goes for a square drive but is still a touch early into his shot and gets a edge  to third man
classy. It was a touch short in length, a bit outside off, enough for Younis who whiplashes it to right of backward point.
again walks couple of steps down the track and places a length delivery outside off to deep point
yorker length, outside off stump, Malik jabs at it, the bat hits the ground and the ball flies away to Dhoni
full in length, just outside off stump, Malik chooses to go back and square drive it to deep point
full, yorker length,  outside off stump, Younis tries to jab it away and Dhoni moves to his right to gather
full and on the middle and off, Malik dabs it down the track
again, full and straight, coming in with the angle, no room to work around and he dabs it away
down the leg side and it brushes the thigh pad en route to Dhoni; the bowler and the 'keeper appeal in hope
a touch short in length and it drifts again towards the hips, clipped past square leg for couple of runs
walks down the track, this time straight down and not across, Zaheer fires it on a length around the middle stump and Malik nudges it to the off side
floats it outside off stump, on a length, Younis leans forward and plays it with the turn to the leg side
full, too full, on the stumps and Younis drives through mid-on
a touch short in length, outside off stump, Malik is quick to get on to the back foot but cuts straight to cover
again on the back of length and this time Malik finds the gap through point
full, on the middle and off stump, Malik drives to long-on for a single
slow through the air, lands outside off stump, turns in and Younis leans across and plays it delicately, with the turn, to the fine-leg region.
flashed over square leg. It was short in length, from round the stumps, Younis stood tall to short-arm pull it over square leg
fuller but down the leg side and Dhoni dives to get his left glove to it

And he strikes immediately from that line. This is his 200th ODI wicket. Full, straight, on the middle and Malik fails to connect well with his slog across the line and is cleaned up. He got a thin inside edge and the middle stump was pegged back.
on the off and middle, Yousuf glides towards the line, head over the ball and steers it to cover point for a single
takes it away from Younis who steers to point
on the off stump line, full in length, going on with the angle, pushed to cover
slow through the air, flighted delivery outside off stump, defended to the off side
fuller, a tad quicker, flicked to midwicket
slow in the air, floated outside off stump, Yousuf leans across to defend
full, just outside off stump, Yousuf wrists it past square leg for a single
pushes it through, released from front of hand, on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
again slows up the pace, flights it outside off stump, Yousuf leans forward, doesn't find any pace to work with and pushes it to cover
from round the stumps, no turn and it drifts on to the legs, tickled away to the on side
short in length, again going on straight with the arm, Yousuf goes back and punches it to wide midwicket
fuller, outside off stump, driven to extra cover
slow in the air, just outside off stump, guided to point
fuller, just outside off stump and that length allows Younis to flick it to the leg side
slow through the air, on the off stump line, eased to cover
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
stumping chance missed. It was spinning down the leg side, brushed the pad as Younis lunged out of the crease but Dhoni failed to gather cleanly
reaches his fifty with a nifty nudge behind square leg. 50 from 70 balls.
leans forward to drive to long-on
stays back, waits for the turn to play out before working it behind square leg
full, outside off stump and driven to long-on
Effortless shot to the long-on boundary. Pure timing. It was floated on the off stump line, Yousuf glided forward and lofted it cleanly to the long-on boundary. One-bounce and over the ropes.
now plays a paddle-sweep to fine-leg region for couple of runs. He fetched that from outside off.
slightly short in length, outside off stump, cut to left of Uthappa at deep point
comes in with the arm, on the off stump, from a length and Yousuf defends on the front foot
on the middle stump line, swept away for a single
Younis tries to imitate Yousuf, goes for a paddle shot but fails to connect and is hit on the pad, outside off stump.
Yousuf unfurls a reverse-sweep but finds the short third-man fielder
on the middle and off, turning in, flicked to fine-leg region
on the middle and leg, turned away to short fine-leg region for a single
full on the off stump line and Yousuf wrists it to long leg for yet another single. 100 up for Pakistan. Run rate is 4.05 per over.
turns in from outside off, Yousuf is struck on the pad, outside off, as he pushes forward to defend
on the middle and off, Yousuf works it to right of midwicket for a single
just outside off stump, turns in slightly, dabbed to cover
short in length, spins in towards middle and leg, Yousuf goes for a big pull shot but is too early into the stroke and it runs away off the pad. The pitch is getting slower.
turns in from outside off, nudged to the off side
a tad short in length, spinning in from outside off, Yousuf goes back to punch it to long-off
Younis drives a full delivery to long-on
on the middle and leg, not much turn and Yousuf stays back to work it past square leg
on the middle stump line, turning in, Yousuf tries to work it to the on side but doesn't connect properly
on the off and middle, wristed behind square leg
slog-sweep for a six. It was tossed-up, full and just outside off stump, Younis went down on his knee and disposed it over deep midwicket boundary
pushes this one outside off and steered to third man region
back to middle and leg and Yousuf has no problem in going back, rolling his wrists over it and picks up a single to long leg
fuller, on the middle stump line, tickled past midwicket for yet another single
Younis has decided to up the ante. He goes down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the rapidly dipping delivery and lofts it to left of deep midwicket
a tad short in length, outside off stump, Yousuf was looking to get forward, shifted his weight on to the back foot and cut it through backward point
picks up a single with a dab to the on side
flatter, on the off and middle, pushed to the on side
full, almost on the blockhole, just outside off stump, chopped to short third man region
on the middle stump line, turned past midwicket
short in length, on the off and middle, pulled away to long leg for a single
on a length, outside off stump, square driven to deep point
length delivery outside off stump, no movement and Younis dabs it away to third man region
lands on a length, outside off stump, shapes away a touch, Yousuf adjusts by opening the bat-face and runs it down to third man
on the off stump line and Younis pushes it towards cover point for a single
full in length, on the off stump line, driven towards mid-off and they rush across for single. There was a direct hit but he was home
floated down the leg side, swept to short-fine leg fielder
from round the stumps again, on the middle and leg, Yousuf is rapped on the pad, going for the sweep shot
arm-ball, sliding on with the arm and Yousuf is struck in front of middle and leg as he pushes forward to defend. Dhoni and Yuvraj appeal for a lbw but it would have probably missed leg stump
picks up a single with a punch to long-off

Yuvraj gets the breakthrough. It was floated slow through the air, landed on the middle and leg stump line and Younis tried to work it across the line but instead, on this slow track, got a leading edge back to Yuvraj.
on a length, on the middle stump line, whipped past square leg
length delivery on the off stump line and Afrid connects with the bottom half of the bat as he drives to cover
on a length, coming in towards middle and off, punched back to Ganguly
shuffles across towards off stump and works a delivery on the middle to fine leg
full and on the middle and off stump line, eased to extra cover
on the middle stump line and Yousuf turns it through midwicket for a single
full and well outside off stump, Yousuf tries to cover drive  but the bat-handle rotates and the ball rolls back down the track
fuller, straighter and driven to cover
lands on the middle stump, on a length, goes away from Yousuf who defends to the off side
walks forward and across the sticks, RP hurls in at the yorker length and he pushes it back down the track

short of length, outside off stump, Yousuf glides towards the line and punches it to left of deep point where Ganguly makes a tumbling stop. The camera pans to the fielding coach, Robin Singh, who smiles.
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side

Ganguly takes out Afridi. It struck  him just outside off stump, though. Afridi tried to paddle-sweep a length delivery coming in from just outside off, missed, and was hit on the pad. He was playing a shot and  the point of impact was marginally outside off and was a tad unlucky to be given out lbw. That's Ganguly's 100th ODI wicket.
on a length, pushed to the off side
nice timing. It was short in length, outside off stump and Misbah punched it through extra cover
drifting on to the pad, worked through midwicket
leans forward to dead-bat a length delivery around the off stump
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
full and outside off stump, square driven to RP at sweeper cover
turning in from just outside off stump, flicked with the turn to short fine-leg fielder
flighted, just outside off stump and worked past midwicket for a single
lands outside off stump, turns ever so slightly and Yousuf dead-bats it to the on side
again outside off stump and Yousuf tries a reverse sweep, gloves it down to the ground and to Dhoni
leans forward to dead-bat a flighted delivery outside off stump
on the middle and off stump line, pushed to the leg  side
low full toss, on the off stump line, turned to RP at deep midwicket.
on the middle stump line, turned to the on side
fuller, on the off and middle stump line and Yousuf drills it through wide mid-off region. Very nicely placed
on the middle and off stump line, pushed to covers
lands on a length, on the off stump, keeps low and even as Ganguly shapes to appeal for a lbw, Yousuf crouches low and jabs it away to the on side.
on the off stump line, flicked behind square leg for a single
pushes it through quicker, just outside off stump, not much turn, steered to short third man
worked to the on side for a single
flighted on the middle, worked behind square leg for a single
on the middle stump line, worked past square leg
short of length, the ball holds up on Yousuf on this sluggish track but he waits on it before punching it through extra cover. Very well played. Classy stroke on a slow track
outside off stump, on a length, steered to wide third man
straight, full, keeps low again, Yousuf leans forward to wrist it through midwicket
slower, full and on the middle and off, driven to long-on for a single
on the off stump line, defended to cover
on the off and middle, from a length, turned to midwicket
outside off stump, no big turn and worked to square leg
turning down leg side, Misbah misses his flick shot and Dhoni can't gather cleanly.
turning in from just outside off, flicked to short fine-leg
slower in the air, outside off stump, Yousuf shapes to push it to the off side but gets a inside edge to the on side
loopy dipping delivery on the middle stump, fullish, driven to long-on
turns in from outside off stump, Yousuf is struck on the pad as he pushes forward to defend
a touch short in length, cut to deep point
on the off stump line, guided to deep point and that's his 59th ODI fifty and 10th against India.
Partly-steered, partly-edged to third man boundary. Fullish, angling away from Misbah who opened the face of the bat and steered it through the vacant slip region.
leans forward to push a full delivery to extra cover
full in length, on the off stump line ,driven to long-off for a single
slower one, on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
short of length, outside off stump, forced to left of sweeper cover
flat and just wide of the stumps, that one keeps really low, cut shot played, off the bottom edge down to the keeper
fullish and on the stumps, worked to the leg side
fuller and down the leg side, swept down to short fine-leg
fullish and outside the off, played away to the sweeper on the off side fence
played back down the pitch to the bowler
flat and quick, not much turn, worked to the on side for a single to end the over
round the stumps comes Pathan, this one is just drifting onto the pads and fullish, should have been put away but Yousuf misses out
short of a good length and outside the off, driven inside out over the top of short cover
just short of a good length and on the off, played towards cover with an angled bat for a single. Pathan cramping the batsmen up for room by coming round the stumps
short of a good length and just outside the off, slower ball, could have been the off cutter, Yousuf tries to steer the ball to third-man but misses, through to the keeper
short of a length and angling in to the right-handed batsman, Yousuf tries to heave the ball over the leg side but misses and is struck on the pad

very full and on the stumps, this time Yousuf lines the ball up well and hits between mid-on and midwicket, using the angle of the delivery. The timing and placement are spot on and Pakistan get a much-needed boundary
short of a good length, pretty flat, on the stumps, defended back down the pitch with a straight bat
very full and on the pads, worked away through the on side
Maximum! This time Yousuf goes for the big one. The ball is tossed up just a bit extra and he goes for the heave over midwicket, making strong connection.
back to full and flat, Yousuf is sensible enough to just ease the ball down to long-on for a single
placed wide of the fielder at deep midwicket
low full-toss on the pads, Misbah dabs this one round the corner for a single
short of a length and outside the off, bowled from over the stumps, slanting away from the right-handed batsman who plays and misses, through to the keeper
full and straight, worked away back down the pitch to the bowler
full-toss on the stumps, driven back past the bowler to the on side
just short of a good length and on the stumps, played away to the off side with an angled bat
short of a good length and outside the off, driven inside out towards Gambhir at cover
slower ball to end the over, once again the batsman tries to open the face and run the ball to third-man and misses
full and on the stumps, driven back down the pitch but does not beat the bowler
short of a good length and on the stumps, driven inside out towards cover
full and outside the off, eased away for a single but the batsman can't get under the ball to play a big shot. India won't mind the singles at this stage
Bang! This time Yousuf gets hold of one that is pitched up and launches it inside out and over cover. That's a cracking shot and a trademark Yousuf one at that
fullish and on the stumps, sweep played and missed, struck on the pad, there's a shout for lbw but turned down as  the batsman was struck outside the line
just short of a good length and on the stumps, driven inside out and on the up through wide long-off but there's a fielder on the fence who mops up
short of length, just outside off stump, cut past point
from round the stumps, slower one, on the off and middle stump, pushed to cover point
fullish, outside off stump, driven to extra cover
on the middle stump line, Yousuf steers through backward point
on the off stump line, fullish, square driven to cover
full in length, driven to long-off for a single
low full toss, outside off stump, swatted away to long-on for a single
on a length, just outside leg stump, Yousuf tries to pull it away, mises and it runs off the pad to the off side
yorker ends up as a low dipping full toss, outside off stump, driven to right of long-off
moves outside leg, Zaheer follows him and Misbah shapes to swing it away but is cramped up
on the leg stump line, on a length, Yousuf tries to help it to fine leg but is struck on the pad and the ball rolls over to Dhoni
shifts his line to middle and off, full in length, Yousuf mistimes a drive to wide midwicket
dropped by Ganguly at extra cover. A full length delivery from round the stumps and Yousuf tried to scoop it inside-out over extra cover but Ganguly leaped up to intercept but couldn't hold on.
dabs to third man to get off the strike
six over the bowler's head. It was a length delivery, from round the stumps and Misbah went down on his back knee and hit cleanly right over the bowler's head. Super strike.
goes for the yorker this time, on the off stump line and its jabbed away to the off side
low full toss, on the middle and leg, Yousuf mistimes a paddle-sweep to Zaheer Khan at short fine-leg
fullish, on the off stump line, Misbah retains the strike with a drive to long-on

done in by the slower one. It was delivered from round the stumps, around 116 kmph, landed on a length, just outside off stump and came in. Misbah was made to wait and he tried to chop it away but failed to get any wood on leather.
another slower one, full and just outside off stump, turned to midwicket for a single
yet another slower one - three in a row - and Yousuf is beaten by the change of pace and ends up just dabbing it to the on side
swings in from outside off, from round the stumps, Yousuf leans across and sweeps it to right of deep square leg
another slower one but this time Yousuf was ready. It was also short in length and Yousuf swung it over short fine leg fielder
around 119kmph slower one again, fuller though and Yousuf flicks it to RP at short fine leg region
from over the wickets, full and straight on the middle, Yousuf paddles it away to long leg
full in length, on the off stump line, Tanvir inside-edges an intended lofted shot on to his pad
length delivery, on the leg stump line, Yousuf misses a pull shot and is struck on the pad
short in length, slanting away from Tanvir who top-edges a slog over Dhoni's head
trapped in front. It landed on a length, on the middle and off, straightened to evade the slog and struck him in front of the stumps
full and outside off, swing and a miss
low full toss, swatted to long-off for a single
goes for the yorker, ends up a low dipping full toss, hit straight to long-off
gets his yorker right this time, on the middle stump and Yousuf stabs it away to the off side
takes out his left leg from the line, has a swing a full pitched delivery just outside off stump but can only mistime it towards midwicket
Yousuf moves to 97 with a lovely clean hit to the straight boundary. It was a length delivery and Yousuf killed it without violence. Can he get to his ton?
He will end up on 99. It was a fullish delivery, around off stump and driven to wide long-on.

inn2.comm: starts off with a wide outside off stump.
two slips in place and Akthar drifts one on to the pads, clipped past square leg for a single
hits the deck short of length, climbs up outside off stump, Tendulkar is on the hop and pushes it to point
beaten Fuller in length and moving away well outside off stump, Tendulkar shapes to punch it on the up but is late on the stroke
up and running. Full, straight, on the middle stump line, Tendulkar moves back to wrist it past square leg.
back to short of length, just outside off stump, pushed to cover
short in length, on the off stump, moves away a touch, Tendulkar tries to whip it through the on side but makes contact with the top of the bat and the ball rolls away to the on side
Caressed away. Lovely piece of timing. It was full in length, no movement after landing and Ganguly leaned forward to cream it through cover.
drifting on to the pads, Ganguly falls over a touch as he tries to work it to the leg side and is struck on the pad
on target this time, around that off stump, on a length and Tendulkar leans across to defend it to cover
And again. Tendulkar moves towards the line, head over the ball and defends well
opens the bat-face a touch and guides another length delivery around the off stump to point
lands on the leg and middle line, Tendulkar jabs it away, ball striking bat and pad, to the leg side
full in length and moving away from Ganguly who is beaten outside the off stump
Shoaib strikes early. Caught at second slip. Fullish, outside off stump and moving away, Ganguly flashes at the width but ends up edging it behind.
short in length, on the middle and off stump line, Gambhir tucks it to square leg
full in length, on the off and middle, Tendulkar works it with the angle to long leg
from round the stumps this time, homing on the off stump and Gambhir taps it to the off side
shout for lbw. It landed outside leg stump and moved in towards the stumps, Tendulkar had thrusted his pad across and had to bring his bat around it and was rapped on the pad
again lands outside leg stump and again struck on the pad
pitches outside leg stump, moves in slightly and Tendulkar can't connect properly with the ball. The left leg is being pushed a tad across and the bat-pad takes the ball to the leg side
full and outside off stump, Gambhir covers his off stump and shoulders arms
this time goes in search of the delivery outside off and mistimes a drive to Afridi at cover
closer to the off stump, Gambhir thinks about playing a stroke before pulling his bat out of the line at the last minute
length delivery drifting on to the pad, Tendulkar fails to connect and the ball rolls off the pad to square leg. He then practises it playing it straight down the track
slightly short in length, on the middle and leg stump line, clipped off the hips but straight to square leg

appeal for lbw as Shoaib knew it struck pad first. It landed on a length, just outside off stump and Tendulkar moved towards the line and it struck him on the pad, just outside off stump, and hit the bat

another shout for lbw but this one was going just over the stumps. It landed short in length, outside off stump, moved in, Tendulkar was on the hop, trying to turn it to the on side but missed it. It hit him in front of off and middle and was slightly high.
leans forward to defend a length delivery to off side
fullish, well outside off stump, Gambhir has a slash and a miss
landed on a length, on the leg and middle, moved towards middle and Gambhir pushed it down the track
Short in length, just outside off stump, Tendulkar went back and across to force it through the point region.
on the leg and middle line and Tendulkar glances it to fine leg where Akthar makes a tumbling stop
on the middle and leg, fullish and that allows Tendulkar to get on to front foot and whip it through midwicket
just outside off stump, Gambhir dabs it, along the ground, to left of Younis who dives to make a half-stop
shifts his line to outside off and Tendulkar drives to mid-off. India need 230 to win from 44.1 overs.
bad line and length - full and on the leg and middle, and Tendulkar wrists it to deep square leg boundary.
on the middle and leg, Gambhir hands the strike over with a dab towards wide mid-on
teasing line and length - bit outside off stump and full but Tendulkar lets it fly past to Akmal
More runs for Tendulkar. Full pitched, on the middle and leg, Tendulkar whips it away , rolling his wrists over the ball, to deep square leg boundary
banged in short of length, climbing outside off, Tendulkar has a lame poke at it and is beaten
short in length, outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to force it off the back foot but again misses it
short in length, outside off stump, run down to third man for a single
full in length, outside off stump, slashed away to third man where Rao fumbles before recovering to make the stop
full, on the leg stump line, Gambhir misses to connect with his flick and the ball rolls off the pad. There is not much bounce on offer here
Classy extra cover drive. Full in length, outside the off stump, Tendulkar glided forward and drove through the line.
Even better. It was short in length this time, just outside off stump, Tendulkar hops back to punch it on the up through extra cover.
short of length again, outside off stump, plays it late this time and places it through backward point for couple of runs
short in length, on the middle stump line, defended down the track
Gone! Gambhir falls to a pull shot. It was short in length, on the middle stump line, he pulled it weakly towards square leg where Tanvir takes the catch.
full in length, on the leg and middle, drifting down as Sehwag pushes forward to defend. The bat came outside the line and the ball clipped the thigh pad
Tendulkar is looking good today. This one was just touch short of length, on the middle stump and he hops up, gets on top of the bounce, and wrists it past square leg.
fuller, on the middle and off line, driven with the full face of the bat to left of mid-on

It gets better and better. He stands tall to a full-pitched delivery and drives with the full face of the bat. The bat came down dead straight and the ball just blurred away to the straight boundary. He seems to be picking the length early today.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
length delivery, outside off stump, guided to third man
short in length, just outside off stump, steered to cover
on a length, on the off and middle, turned to square leg
length delivery that straightened on the off stump, Tendulkar is a touch squared-up and gets a outside edge to point
Another crashing drive but straight to Afridi at cover. It was full pitched, outside off stump and he creamed it on the front foot
length delivery, just outside off stump, Sehwag slashes it to point
on the legs, full in length, Sehwag is struck on the pad as the bat comes down in an angle. The ball was sliding down leg, though.
full in length, on the middle stump line, Tendulkar turns it to midwicket
full in length, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
lands on a length, just outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to knife it on the up and gets a inside edge to the leg side
full pitched, on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side
leans forward to drive down the track and Gul intercepts
drags back the length a touch, just outside off stump, steered to point
short in length, outside off stump, guided to point
there he goes again. Slightly short in length, outside off stump, Tendulkar first went back before pushing back and slapped it through cover point
And again. And the fifty is up in style. Short in length and just outside off stump, Tendulkar is great nick today and forces this one on the up and through cover.
pushes it to the point, sets off for a run before sending Tendulkar back and he g gets into the crease in time to beat Afridi
Sehwag continues to struggle. Full pitched, on the off and middle, he is late on to the drive, the bat comes down in an angle and he edges it to the leg side
just outside off stump and driven to the off side
length delivery, shaping in towards off stump, Sehwag opens the bat-face and pushes it to cover
breaks free with a drive through cover. Full in length, outside off stump, Sehwag leans across, good positive stride out and drives
another crisp cover drive but straight to the cover fielder. Tendulkar is shining brightly in Gwalior.
from wide of the crease, round the stumps, full and on the off stump line, dabbed away to point
a touch short, just outside off stump, cut to left of backward point
fuller, just outside off stump, again from round the stumps, driven to Malik at short cover
walks out to drive a length delivery to extra cover
picks up a single with a flick to wide midwicket region
Full in length, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
on the off stump line, steered to backward point
full in length, just outside off stump, Sehwag moves forward, gets close to the line  and square drives to point
overpitched on the legs, flicked to long leg
full in length, just outside off stump, pushed to wide mid-off
on the middle and leg, turned to right of midwicket, Sachin wants the single but is sent back. He can't wait to get on strike
appeal for lbw as the bowler and the 'keeper thought it hit his pad first before making contact with bat. It was full in length, on the middle and off, Sehwag jabbed at it as it came in a touch.
Tendulkar is not relenting. He leaned forward to wrist a length delivery on the stumps through midwicket
walks out of the crease, ends up yorking himself in the process and the ball rolls back down the track.
slower one, outside off stump, Tendulkar tries to steer it but the ball bounces more than he expects and goes over the blade
turned to short fine-leg region for a single
Now Sehwag joins in the fun. Short and well outside off stump, Sehwag went back and across to slap it through backward point
on the stumps, turned to the leg side for a single
full and outside the off, that's easy pickings for Sehwag who drives through the line stylishly to pick up four more
too full and straight this time, Sehwag walks across his stumps and flicks well through the on side
just short of a driving length and outside the off, Sehwag opens the face of his bat and runs the ball down to third-man
just short of a good length and on the off, punched off the back foot but straight to the fielder at mid-off
short of a good length and outside the off, defended towards cover with an angled bat
tossed up and on the stumps, a bit slow through the air to start with, defended towards cover
very full and on the leg stump, defended back down the pitch
very full and on off, driven just wide of the fielder at cover
again quite full and straight, eased down to long-off with minimum fuss
driven hard but straight to the fielder at short cover
quicker and flatter, just slipping down the leg side, Tendulkar clips the ball off his pads down towards fine-leg

short of a good length and outside the off stump, Tendulkar watches that one carefully, but misses a forcing shot through the off side. He seems to suggest to the umpire that the ball has become discoloured and that he's having some trouble spotting it
short of a good length and outside the off stump, punched to cover
quicker and just outside the off, just a hint of away movement, swing and a miss, through the keeper
full and straight, Tenudlkar waits on the ball and uses his wrists to flick the ball through the on side
full and on the off, driven inside out towards cover
short of a good length and on the stumps, punched back down the pitch to the bowler
fullish and straight, played at and missed, rapped on the pads, appeal for the lbw, turned down
defended to the leg side
another one that is quick and flat and slipping down leg, flick played and missed, rapped on the pad
short of a good length and on the middle and leg once more, a hint of turn, defended, off the outside edge too the off side
Bang! Tossed up just a bit extra and Sehwag goes for the big shot, planting his foot down the ground and launching the ball over midwicket for a huge six
short in length, outside off stump, dabbed to wide third man
short of length, just outside off, nudged to left of backward point for a single
full and straight, driven to mid-off
on the middle and leg, wristed past square leg
short in length, just outside off stump, punched to cover
on a length, around off stump, opens the bat-face and steers to backward point
short in length, steered to cover point
Fab shot again. He walked outside leg stump, made room and drove inside-out over extra cover.
This is the good old Tendulkar again. Again, he moves outside leg stump, Afridi fires it in on the stumps but Sachin keeps his head still and square drives through cover point
Runs are coming in a flood. Walks a step or two, diagonally, creates room and carves a slightly short of length delivery to the cover point boundary
pushed to the offside
short of length, on the middle and off stump line, Sehwag hops up and rolls his wrists over the ball to send it down to long leg
in the zone outside off stump, straightens after landing, Tendulkar tries to run it down to third man and is beaten
short in length, on the off stump, cut to point
full in length, on the middle stump line, pushed down the track
full in length, on the off stump line, Tendulkar doesn't move his feet out, just stands there, bends his knee to get into right balance and punches on the up to cover
just outside the  off stump line, slightly short and Sehwag, who is on a middle-stump guard, cuts it down to third man
outside off stump, a touch short in length and Sehwag, on the front foot, slices it through backward point
on the stumps, driven to left of long-on for couple of runs
on the middle stump line, slow through the air, Sehwag pushes it to right of midwicket
moves outside leg stump, Afridi sends a slider on the middle and leg, Tendulkar tries to punch it through the off side, gets a inside edge and it runs to fine leg.
on the stumps, driven through the on side for a single
fullish, just outside off stump, driven to cover
banged in short of length, on the middle stump line, Tendulkar hops to get on top of the bounce and clips it past square leg
fullish, on the middle stump line, driven to gap in the cover for a single
on the pads, tucked to fine leg for a single
on the middle stump line, Sehwag stays adjacent to the line, opens the bat-face and steers it through cover point
lands on a length, on the off stump, cuts away a touch, pushed to point
climbs from the length, outside off stump, Tendulkar flashes at it but is beaten by the extra bounce
full in length, outside off stump, Tendulkar glides forward, opens the bat-face and steers it to through backward point.
lands on a length, on the middle and leg, and straightens, Tendulkar was looking to play it to the on side, is squared-up and edges it to point
on the off stump, pushed to point
a surprise bouncer and Sehwag ducks under
short in length, climbing up outside off stump and Sehwag upper cuts it to third man boundary.
sharp bouncer, coming in from just outside off stump, Tendulkar was on the shuffle, got too close to the line of the delivery but manages to sway away from the line.
fuller length this time, just outside off stump and Tendulkar leans across to push it to covers
on a length, just outside off stump, guided to backward point
moves into 90's with a flash over backward point. It was short in length, outside off stump, Tendulkar punched it up and over backward point.
slower one, fuller and driven straight down the track. Akthar is hit on the left ankle as he goes down to field
on a length, outside off stump, Tendulkar stands up tall, expecting it to bounce more, but manages to squeeze it to third man

in the air, to left of short cover, though. Gul held it across the seam and sent one on a length, on the off stump line, it stopped a touch on Tendulkar who checked his drive and it goes in the air but to left of short cover. Iffy moment there.

gets run out, trying to give Tendulkar the strike. He set off for a run after driving a fuller delivery to mid-off and is caught just short of the crease as the direct hit comes in. He struggled a touch initially but settled down to play a good hand.
gets behind the line of a length delivery on the off stump line and defends to off side
keeps a touch low, outside off stump, Tendulkar swoops low to punch it past backward point
on the leg and middle line, tickled to the leg side
lands on the off stump, moves away, Yuvraj tries to force it on the up, through cover, but gets a inside-edge to the on side
full and outside off stump, Yuvraj chases it and is beaten
fuller, just outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
slower one, turns away from Yuvraj who steers it to cover point. That brings Tendulkar on strike.
here comes a bouncer, Tendulkar hops up and uses his wrists to keep the ball down, to cover point for a single
pushed across Yuvraj who shoulders arms.

Would you believe it? Tendulkar has got out in the 90's again. For the sixth time this year. It landed on a length, outside off stump and shaped away a touch, Tendulkar pushed at it, bat away from the body and at an angle, and got a fatal inside-edge. He stays there, resting on the bat, for a while before slowly turning to walk back.
short of length, outside off stump, steered to point
fuller, well outside off stump, Dhoni drives and the outside edge takes it down to third man
on the off stump line, full and straight, pushed down the track
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
bouncer at the body, top edges a pull to fine leg
leans forward to cream a full pitched delivery through cover
on the off stump line, edged to third man
drifts down leg side, Dhoni doesn't connect with his flick shot
from round the stumps, on the off stump, defended to the off side
short in length, coming in towards off and middle, clipped past square leg
slower one, full, on the middle stump, on driven through wide midon
Imperious. Banged in short, just outside off stump, Yuvraj was on the front foot, pushed back to pull it away to midwicket boundary
from round the stumps this time, full and on the middle stump, pushed to mid-on
leans forward, opens the bat-face and steers a full delivery to cover point
short in length, cuts in to beat the intended wristy push and strikes the thigh pad
full in length, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
on the off stump line, bottom-edges a cut to short third man
full toss, around waist-high, swatted away to fine leg
full pitched outside off stump, creamed through cover
on the middle, fullish, turned past midwicket
full pitched outside off stump, mistimes a drive to mid-off
on a length, on the middle stump line, swatted to midwicket
banged in short, on the off stump line, pulled to long leg for a single
low full toss, outside off stump, square driven through cover point
full pitched, on the stumps, driven down the track
on the middle stump, coming in with the round-the-stumps angle, flicked past square leg
Fab cover drive. It was full in length, outside off stump, Yuvraj drove on the up through cover
shortens the length further, outside off stump, pushed to the off side
short in length, outside off, guided to backward point
closer to the off stump, nudged towards extra cover for a single
leans forward and pushes a length delivery to cover point
full in length, on the off stump line, driven through the off side
short of a length and outside the off, chopped away through point
low full-toss on the leg stump, whipped through midwicket and the ball races away to the fence
full and on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
just short of a length and on the stumps, Yuvraj tries to swish the ball to the leg side but it early on the shot. The ball goes off the leading edge back over the bowler's head
short of a good length and outside the off, cut hard but straight to point
short of a driving length and outside the off, flashed hard at, off a thick outside edge down to third-man and the two-gundred comes up
well-directed yorker, bang on the base of the stumps, Yuvraj digs it out well in the end
good-length ball on the stumps, Yuvraj shuffles down the pitch and deflects the ball to the leg side
just short of a good length and on the off, driven inside out to cover
tossed up a touch and on the stumps, defended carefully
full and down the leg side, sweep played and missed but the ball evades Kamran Akmal
short of a driving length, on the pads, Dhoni comes down the pitch and works the ball to the leg side
full and straight, Yuvraj leans into the stroke and drives the ball authoritatively down to long-on
down the pitch, flick played and missed, struck on the pad, loud shout for the lbw but that wasn't even close
short of a length and outside the off, chopped away just wide of point
full and outside the off, played at and missed, through to the keeper
good-length ball outside the off, driven uppishly to off but falls short of the man at cover
full and going down leg, Dhoni helps the ball along to fine-leg
full and on the off, Yuvraj watches the ball onto bat and defends towards cover with an angles bat
good-length ball outside the off, Yuvraj opens the face and runs this past point for an easy single
slipping down the leg side, played at and missed, rapped on the pads
full and on the leg side, worked to the on side
fullish and on the off, keeps a bit low, pushed to cover
full once more and just outside the off, Yuvraj waits on the ball and paddles it round the corner
flat and straight, driven easily down to long-on
flat and on the stumps, worked away to the on side off the pads
quicker one, down leg side, hit away past the man at fine-leg in unorthodox but effective fashion
again too full and on the pads, worked away through midwicket for a single to end the over
short of a good length and on the off, chopped away with an angled bat. Shoaib Akhtar back in a last throw of the dice
short of a length and outside the off, the ball stops a bit before coming on to Dhoni, worked to the leg side
once again short of a length and outside the off, this time slightly slower and the ball grips the surface, played away to leg somewhat awkwardly
short of a driving length and outside the off, played back past the bowler with soft hands. There's some hesitation about running and in the end the batsmen wisely abstain
slower ball on the off, floated in a touch, Yuvraj plays late and defends carefully back down the pitch
fullish and outside the off, driven back past the bowler to the on side
steps down the track and turns it through midwicket
Yuvraj comes down the track, the bowler drags back the length and Yuvraj lunges to jab it to cover point
floated full and outside off, driven to cover
slow in the air but too short and Dhoni has all the time to go back and cut it to right of sweeper cover
comes down the track and places the ball neatly just past square leg. Akmal runs after it and Dhoni comes back for the second.
well outside off stump, spins away slightly, Dhoni stretches across and has a flash but can't reach it
banged in short, Yuvraj swivels of the front foot and pulls it to deep square leg
fullish, on the middle and off, driven through mid-off
Now Dhoni cashes in. Full in length, outside off stump and Dhoni flashes it through backward point
drags back the length and Dhoni arches back to cut it to left of deep point
change of pace, on the off stump line, punched through cover point
slower one, fullish, on the middle and off stump, Yuvraj edges a drive on to his pad
steps down the track and drives to left of long-on for couple of runs
slider on the middle stump line, punched to long-on
another one sliding away from Yuvraj and he dabs it to short third man
on the legs this time, turned to fine leg for a single
pushed it through quicker, on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
on the middle and off, short in length, punched to long-on and will retain the strike
Yuvraj hastens the end with a pull over deep midwicket. A long hop from Salman, who is bowling off spin,  is pulled over the boundary
fuller, on the stumps, defended on the front foot
on the legs, Yuvraj tickles it behind square leg for a single. Over to you, Dhoni
fullish, just outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
floated on the off stump, driven to long-off and that brings up his fifty.
goes down the track, too early and Salman sends it just outside leg stump, Dhoni arrests his forward movement and drags back his back foot in. Meanwhile, the ball runs off the pad
leans forward to drive to long-on
drives to sweeper cover for another single
on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Yuvraj continues to tease the crowd; just leans forward to turn it to midwicket
retains the strike with a push to cover point
on the stumps, tapped to midwicket
on the pads, tucked to fine leg

Dhoni has had enough of these singles and murders one over long-on to bring up the series victory. Dhoni walks across, shakes hand with Yuvraj, then collects one stump before shaking hands with Afridi who walks over to him. Jason chimes in: "It has taken 24 years for India to win a home series versus Pakistan." The last one was achieved on October 2 1983.
